sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Greek MEP and former Vice President of the European Parliament Eva Kali is allowed to remove an electronic bracelet and is freed from house arrest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The Wagner mercenary group says it's handing over Bakhmut to the Russian military as anti-Putin militia fighters say they'll step up their actions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Massive fire breaks out in the central district of Sydney with hundreds evacuated from the area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Tributes pour in from the world of rock and roll and beyond following the death of singer Tina Turner who died at the age of 83.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Thank you, my daughter is waiting for me so I'm very happy that I will be with her in a bit. Greek MEP Eva Kalli is on probation and without an electronic bracelet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Belgian federal prosecutor's office has lifted the house arrest imposed on the former vice president of the European Parliament since last April, after she spent four months in prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Kalli was arrested in December for her part in a corruption scandal involving the government of Qatar and MEPs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Both governments angrily deny playing any role.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The chief of the Wagner mercenary group, Evgeny Prigozhin,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: says his fighters have started to leave Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The video message on social media follows his claim to have taken control of the city, a claim Kyiv denied.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: He said he'll leave Bakhmut to the Russian military, which he's frequently criticized.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We will leave those who played a major role in the capture of Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: But the seizure of Bakhmut has been overshadowed by the incursion into Russian territory of anti-Putin Russian militias, and they've promised to keep up the pressure on Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: If yesterday it was several tens of kilometers of territory, then tomorrow it will be hundreds of square kilometers of territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It will no longer be a village, but an area center.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And there will be people who will help us in Russia, who have been waiting for us for a long time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russia continues to strike different targets in raids.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Kyiv suffered a new mass drone attack overnight.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian authorities claim to have shot down 36 drones in three hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This was the moment a seven-story building collapsed after a raging fire in the central district of Sydney. There have been no reports of casualties, but hundreds of people had to be evacuated from a nearby apartment block.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The blaze caused major disruption as more than 100 firefighters and 20 emergency vehicles were called to the scene.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It took about two hours to contain the fire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The cause is not yet known.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Iran has unveiled what it says is its newest ballistic missile, in a move likely to increase tension with Israel and Western countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Officials say the Qarimshah-4 rocket has a range of 2,000 kilometers and can carry a 1,500-kilo warhead, putting Israel in range.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: They also released footage of what's claimed to be a successful test launch of the weapon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Iran developed its ballistic missile program partly in response to Western sanctions that prevent it from accessing modern attack aircraft.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A recent influx of migrants from Africa and the Middle East attempting to enter Poland has sparked concerns in neighboring Germany, causing some to call for a reintroduction of border controls along the country's shared border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But a spokesperson for the Polish border guard stressed that migrants who enter the EU come not only through Poland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The people who speak German are people who have a Belarusian or Russian background.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Migrants still have Russian visas. Strona niemiecka to są osoby, które mają ślad białoruski lub ślad rosyjski. Migranci cały czas mają świeże wizy rosyjskie.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Mamy też informację od strony łotewskiej, od strony litewskiej, że sporo osób, które właśnie przekroczyły do nich granicę z Białorusi nielegalnie, byli w ośrodkach takich otwartych dla cudzoziemców.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: My w tym roku przy granicy polsko-litewskiej zatrzymaliśmy już dwa razy więcej migrantów niż rok temu o tej samej porze. We have already detained twice as many migrants as a year ago at the same time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: There are also many more migrants on the Polish-Belarusian border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Michal Wolny, a volunteer, is getting ready for another trip to the forest with humanitarian aid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Currently, especially after the winter, you can see the intensification of this movement on the Polish-Belarusian border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In the spring, were many more interventions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Our group had four such interventions during the last 24 hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We can also see increased brutalization by the border services of both countries, which is the consequence of a greater number of crimes and acts of violence that take place in relation to people who leave.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: From my country, I took the plane to Russia because the direct visas for France are not easy to get at home. So we take all the possible routes to get there, with all the possible dangers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: They're crossing the border on foot. They stay in the Polish forests in harsh conditions for days at a time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: I left my country because there is war and there is no stability.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We are looking for a new life.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Despite the wall that Poland has built along the border, the migrant route through Russia and Belarus is still operational.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And it doesn't seem that this situation will come to an end soon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Magdalena Hodownik, Franck Kuuznica, for Euronews.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Germany's economy is technically in recession after shrinking for a second successive quarter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Data released by the Federal Statistical Office shows gross domestic product declined by 0.3% between January and March. This follows a decline of 0.5% in the last three months of 2022 in Europe's biggest economy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The figures also reveal employment rose in this year's opening quarter when inflation eased. But this hasn't prevented the country from tipping into what most economists define as a recession.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Lufthansa and the Italian government have reached an agreement for the German airline group to purchase an initial 40% stake in ITER Airways, the loss-making successor to Italy's Alitalia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The 40% stake could grow to a later investment of at least 90%. The German airline group will be putting forward between 320 and 330 million euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Lufthansa previously struck a similar two-stage deal in acquiring Brussels Airlines, one of several additions within the group.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: French far-right leader Marine Le Pen has called a parliamentary inquiry looking into

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: possible links between her national rally party and Russia a witch hunt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: At the center of discussions is a 9.4 million euro loan her party took out from a Czech-Russian bank, which is still being repaid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Le Pen, who is trying to shake off accusations of party ties to Russia's President Putin and Hungarian leader Viktor Orban, says the loan committed her to nothing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Teachers in Romania have taken part in a third day of industrial action and attended a rally to call for higher pay. Tens of thousands turned out for the protest, including auxiliary teaching employees and non-teaching staff. Trade unionists want a starting salary for newly qualified teachers to be at least equal to the gross average salary in the country. They also want to see annual pay index linked to inflation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The annual Qatar Economic Forum in Doha is drawing to a close. Qatar has once again secured their seat at the international table. Discussions between delegates will come to an end before finishing with a closing ceremony.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Now, there's been lots going on over the last few days, from keynote interviews with political powerhouses to business leaders pitching their plans for the future of the global economy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Well, earlier, I caught up with Kristalina Gorgieva, who is the managing director of the IMF. She's been at the center of some of the most high-profile talks of the last few days, and she shared her views on economic progress within the region and made a big announcement on fund allocations for developing nations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: These countries have been growing strongly, and a very important element of this growth is more and more it is diversified away from hydrocarbons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Qatar's growth last year in the non-hydrocarbon sector was the strongest in the whole Gulf, 6.7%.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Qatar is going to direct through the IMF $265 million equivalent so we can lend at zero interest rate to low-income countries, to vulnerable middle-income and low-income countries that strive to address the risks of climate change.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The managing director of the IMF there reminding us all that investing in developing nations is key to securing all of our futures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Guy Schoen for Euronews in Doha.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Tributes have poured in from the world of rock and roll and beyond following the announcement of Tina Turner's death at the age of 83.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Turner initially found fame in a turbulent and abusive musical partnership with her husband Ike Turner, but later became one of the biggest acts in the world as a solo artist and one of the defining pop icons of the 1980s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Elton John said Turner was a total legend on record and on stage, and he added, we have lost one of the world's most exciting and electric performers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Mick Jagger, who duetted with Turner during Live Aid in 1985, wrote, I'm so saddened by the passing of my wonderful friend Tina Turner.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: She was truly an enormously talented performer and singer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Even former US President Barack Obama tweeted she was powerful, unstoppable and unapologetically herself.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Fellow female singers, including Debbie Harry of Blondie, expressed feelings of gratitude for Turner's trailblazing as a woman in a tough and often discriminatory world of music.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Throughout her career the hits just kept coming.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In the 1960s with her husband they produced groundbreaking hits such as Proud Mary, River Deep, Mountain High.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And then later as a solo artist Tina gifted us songs like The Best and What's Love Got To Do With It.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Turner died after a long illness in her home in Kusnacht near Zurich in Switzerland.
